1.12.2.5.3.11: New augment and a lot of Plugin support.
1.12.2.5.3.10: New machine - an autocrafter. And Morb processing!
1.12.2.5.3.8: Overhauls to a couple of machines. New item - Reservoir. New satchel functionality. New augments! Go read the full changelog.
1.12.2.5.3.7: A fairly large update - new machines and devices. Go read the full changelog. First 1.12.2 required release.

1.12.5.3.6: More Plugins! Twilight Forest, Plants 2, Extra Utilities. Also adds the Aquatic Entangler!
1.12.5.3.5: Added and updated LOTS of Plugins. Forestry, Binnies, Magic Bees, Gendustry, IC2, Traverse, etc.
1.12.5.3.3: New augments! And a couple of bugfixes.
1.12.5.3.2: Biomes O' Plenty integration. And Mushroom Stew.

1.11.2.5.2.4: Lots of x-mod plugin support. Adds Satchel and Centrifuge.
1.11.2.5.2.3: Fixes for the Energetic Infuser, and a Magma Crucible Recipe.
1.11.2.5.2.1: Fixes to Arboreal Extractor and Fluid Transposer.

1.10.2.5.1.6: Fixes for the Energetic Infuser, and a Magma Crucible Recipe.
1.10.2.5.1.4: Fix to Arboreal Extractor and Sap generation.
1.10.2.5.1.2: Fixes a bug with the Sawmill.
1.10.2.5.1.0: Lots of changes. Capacitors and strongboxes!
1.10.2.5.0.4: And yet more bugfixes. Some groundwork for 5.1.
1.10.2.5.0.3: More bugfixes! Also redid Sawmill Recipes and added configs for machine features
1.10.2.5.0.2: Improvements to Thermal Mediator, adjustments to Steel creation.
